usage: strength training, fitness exercises including swings, deadlifts, squats, lifting, lunges, get-ups, snatches for muscle groups like biceps, shoulders, legs

Textured surface for corrosion resistance and better grip

ai_description: A solid black cast iron kettlebell with a textured finish, featuring the KAKSS brand name and logo printed in white on the front. The 5KG weight is clearly marked. The kettlebell has a wide, textured handle for secure grip and a flat machined bottom for stability. Close-up views show the detailed texture of the cast iron surface and handle. The product includes customer support information with a toll-free helpline number and operating hours displayed on an informational graphic.
